name: Kung Fury: Street Rage – Ultimate Edition
overview: Get blown into another dimension as you experience the gut-busting fun with the Kung Fury game. Beat the Nazis to stop Kung Führer and uphold the law! A brand new HT-3000 cartridge game packed with: • Endless arcade-style beat 'em up Nazi fights • Pro tips from HackerMan in the Hackademy Practice Mode • Single player story campaign • 2-player coop story campaign • Hasselhoff as a playable character • 5 heroes with their own ultimate powers
